tool_description: Generate EPC QR Codes to use it on your invoices and payment requests.
name: EPC QR Code
title: EPC QR Code

api_list.name: generateEpcQrCode
api_list.description: Generate EPC QR Codes to use it on your invoices and payment requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://epc-qr-code.p.rapidapi.com/v1/epc-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "epc-qr-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://epc-qr-code.p.rapidapi.com/v1/epc-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "epc-qr-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
